ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Direct X
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats all you need to do... and maybe make sure your sound & video drivers are up to date. Also, change the date on your computer =p you re past few posts have
ygData.messageBody:
Thats all you need to do... and maybe make sure
your sound & video drivers are up to date. Also,
change the date on your computer =p you're past
few posts have shown up as July in my inbox - for
a few minutes I was cussing out Yahoo, thinking
they were just getting around to sending them!!!!
Hehehe...
